selrach.bnetbuilder.model
Class DynamicBayesNetModel

java.lang.Object
  selrach.bnetbuilder.model.DynamicBayesNetModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateUpdatedListener
public class DynamicBayesNetModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateUpdatedListener

Main class for the dynamic Bayesian network model. Construction of model as well as slice spawning happens in this class.

Author:
Charles Robertson

createEdge

public void createEdge(RandomVariable from,
                       RandomVariable to,
                       int time)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Creates an edge in the graph

Parameters:
from - the variable where the edge originates
to - the variable where the edge terminates
time - what timeslice this node comes from: 0 intra-edge >0 inter-edge with currentTime-time being the slice it originates from
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

generateFirstSlice

public void generateFirstSlice()
Generates the first slice in the model as well as reseting the internal mechanisms to the initial slice.

generateNextSlice

public int generateNextSlice()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Generates the next set of transient variables and returns the timestep that we think we are on. Run generateFirstSlice to reset. We roll up priors, so iterating through time slices are really one way.

Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getNextOrder

public int getNextOrder()
This gets an order value so that we always have a consistent layout of parents when we construct them or pass them into any conditional distributions, essentially an artificially imposed ordering that makes our life a bit easier.

Returns:

getVariables

public java.util.List<RandomVariable> getVariables()
Gets the topologically sorted list of variables. Topology is only enforce intra-slice. All interslice nodes can essentially be said to be infront of intra-slice nodes in this ordering

Returns:

removeVariable

public void removeVariable(RandomVariable variable)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Remove a variable from the network. This INVALIDATES all CPDs that were using this variable in some way! You must go through and recreate new CPDs for variables utilizing this edge

Parameters:
variable -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

removeVariable

public void removeVariable(java.lang.String id)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Removes a variable from the network by id. This INVALIDATES all CPDs that were using this variable in some way! You must go through and recreate new CPDs for variables utilizing this edge
